New Records: Orlando Magic tied a franchise record with nine three-pointers in the first quarter.
Orlando Magic set a franchise record with 13 three-pointers in the first half.
Key Match Events: Orlando Magic made a season-high 19 shots from beyond the arc.
Orlando Magic pulled ahead with a 23-6 run in the final five minutes of the first quarter.
Jalen Suggs left the game late in the second quarter with back spasms.
Post-Match Reflections: Jakob Poeltl commented on the team's undisciplined mistakes and lack of aggressive closeouts.
Raptors head coach Darko Rajakovic highlighted the defensive issues at the three-point line.
Forward Ochai Agbaji noted the need for more effort in closing out on shooters.
